attributes.action: Secure digital freedom: Enact a Digital Bill of Rights. Forbid CBDC
attributes.additional_details: We call on the UK Government to enact a Digital Bill of Rights, safeguarding individual ownership and control of biometric data and prohibiting harmful digital technologies such as psychographic warfare. The bill must also protect against the use of central bank digital currencies, preserving individual financial sovereignty.
attributes.background: Enact a Digital Bill of Rights to protect individuals' biometric data, financial autonomy, and privacy from digital surveillance and psychological warfare. Secure the fundamental rights and dignity of all people in the digital age. #DigitalRights #Privacy #BiometricDataProtection

rejection.details:
The Data Protection Act 2018 controls how your personal information is used by organisations, businesses or the government.

We can accept petitions requesting changes to this, but it would need to be clear what changes you would like.

You may wish to sign the following petition that calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624159
